title: Harang agrees to terms with Reds
subtitle: Harang agrees to one-year deal with Reds
body: Aaron Harang's breakthrough 2005 season earned the right-hander quite a hefty raise. Harang and the Reds avoided arbitration by agreeing to a one-year, $2.35 million contract Tuesday. That's quite a bump from the $440,000 Harang pulled in last year. Anthony Castrovince is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Anthony Castrovince
